text: <Þis> is þara XII hida boc þe Eþælstan cing gebocode Aðelwardæ his þægne æt meonæ on ece yrfæ.
Ærest of mearc beorge weste weardum.
Þanon andlang hegerewe on ðone hlinc easteweardne.
Þonne þurh þone lea on þam leage.
And þanon norð on oðer del eac westeweard.
Norð to eaces stede midde weardum þanon on ge rihte to brom dæne on þæt bec.
Of þæm bæce ofer þone ham on þone scagan ute weardne to hure ðes treowe þonne east andlang dic to þam eastram bæce.
Þonne norð andlang bæces on hnut leage bære.
Of þæm mere to þæm wege.
Þanon on crute brece leage weste eastewearde.
Up to strete andlang strete on himan beorgas.
Þonne andlang hlinces norð to mearc beorge.
